data.name: Eddie Hill in the Curse of the Skull Medallion
data.detailed_description:
Check out our upcoming game !

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1112390/


About the Game

EDDIE HILL in The Curse of the Skull Medallion
is an hardcore platformer inspired by the modern classics of the genre.

In this adventure, Eddie must retrieve the Skull Medallion sitting atop a mountain walled by a perilous jungle and an ancient temple full of dangers.

The levels in this game were designed by students during a level design workshop I held in March 2021.

Features:

16 levels split in 3 worlds.
Collectibles
A SpeedRun mode.
Loads of deaths
Spikes
Bad jokes

data.short_description: Help Eddie to retrieve the Skull Medallion sitting atop a mountain walled by a perilous jungle and an ancient temple full of dangers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3320M 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 - 650 3.20Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX660 or superior
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
